title: Finding the Fire Within
description: Anna may have found a place to belong in the Seaside Pack but she is starting to realize that the guys are more than just family to her. Now that she is overcoming her past and shedding the scars that years of abuse have left, she finds a whole new world opening up to her. There is no way that she can choose between the charismatic pack-master, the dark and mysterious James, her gentle giant, the fun twins, and her sweet genius, but what if she didnâ€™t have to? Meanwhile, their enemies are closing in and she needs to connect with her inner wolf to defend her pack.
author: C.C. Masters
